price: ߝߏ߫ ߤߌߣߊ ߞߊ߬ ߝߘߊ߫ ߌ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߊ߫ ߘߋ߬ ߸ ߓߊߏ߬ ߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߢߊ߬ߒߡߊ߭ ߓߏ߲߬ߓߊ߫ ߟߵߌ ߞߊ߲߬
arabic: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّ فَضۡلَهُۥ كَانَ عَلَيۡكَ كَبِيرٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: illā raḥmatan min rabbika inna faḍlahu kāna ʿalayka kabīran
